Well it seems that many people have already helped you, they already said everything I would've said and more.
However if you need any help in regards to making the game itself, don't hesitate to contact me, I'm starting a Game Studio (Null DIES) and we're currently making a game for marketing purposes :)

I just remembered an important point, after your estimation and make the deal, use a tool like toggl.com to measure the actual time you spent working on the project, that way you get a better idea of how much you underestimate the time and hopefully give a better estimation in the next project :)
